fields.askill_desc: Inflicts 10x ATK Water Mass Attack

1.5x ATK for Water Att. for 4 turns;
inflicts 20x ATK Water Att. attack on all enemies
Halves damage for 5 turns
Recovers 300 HP
Recovers 500 HP

Removes {locks},
changes {Heal}{Jammers}{Poison}{Lethal Poison}{Bombs} to {Fire}
Replaces all Orbs

Removes {locks},
changes {Heal}{Jammers}{Poison}{Lethal Poison}{Bombs} to {Dark}
Halves enemies' DEF for 5 turns
Recovers 2,000 HP

Inflicts a 100x ATK attack on 1 enemy;
3x ATK for Balanced Type for 1 turn

Inflicts a 100x ATK attack on 1 enemy;
3x ATK for Attacker Type for 1 turn

Inflicts a 100x ATK attack on 1 enemy;
3x ATK for Devil Type for 1 turn
Inflicts a 2x ATK Water Att. attack on all enemies

Reduces damage by 60% for 3 turns;
other allies' skills charged by 1 turn

50% chance of Enhanced Orbs appearing & 4x ATK
for Balanced Type for 3 turns; replaces all Orbs

4x ATK for Devil Type for 1 turn; removes {locks},
changes {Heal} to {Dark}, Dark Orbs enhanced

Fully recovers HP;
creates 9 {Light} at random

4x ATK for Attacker Type for 1 turn; removes {locks},
changes {Heal} to {Fire}, Fire Orbs enhanced

Adds 1 combo & voids enemies' DEF for
5 turns; removes {locks}, creates 3 {Dark}
